title: Machine Learning-Based High-Strength Aluminum Alloy Design Project

context.prior_knowledge: Foundations of Materials Science, Principles of Alloy Design, and Basic Understanding of Machine Learning Algorithms
context.additional_context: Operating data analysis and collaborative platforms using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can explain key performance indicators of high-strength aluminum alloys (tensile strength, fracture toughness, and stress corrosion resistance).
Learners can analyze the correlation between alloy elemental composition and performance using machine learning models.
The predictive performance of the designed alloy combinations can be evaluated by comparing them with experimental data
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
